SELECT rownum, unit_price_code, serial_lot_code, item_code, item_name, standard_cost, purchase_price, selling_price FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, unit_price_code, u.serial_lot_code, item_code, u.item_name, standard_cost, purchase_price, selling_price FROM tbl_unit_price u, tbl_serial_lot sl WHERE u.serial_lot_code = sl.serial_lot_code AND
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM REGISTRATION_DATE) AS month, AVG(purchase_price) AS mon_avg FROM tbl_serial_lot s, tbl_unit_price u WHERE s.serial_lot_code = u.serial_lot_code AND s.item_code = #{item_code} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM REGISTRATION_DATE) BETWEEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) - 6 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM REGISTRATION_DATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM REGISTRATION_DATE) ORDER BY month
